name: Nightmare Simulator (itch)
description:
Controls -

WASD/arrow keys for movement

Space/Enter for interaction/ending cutscenes

R for restarting the game

Assests I didn't make -

House tileset + "Reality" BG: https://assetbakery.itch.io/horror-house-tileset

"Nightmare" BG: https://joshua-mclean.itch.io/music-pack-6

Font: https://narehop.itch.io/handimandy-free

Special thanks to my friend who's a BAB for helping me debug and getting things to happen
